page.title: Privacy Policy
page.subtitle: How we protect your data and privacy

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, and to communicate with you.
list: To send you technical notices and support messages
To respond to your comments and questions

sections.title: 3. Data Security
sections.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access.

sections.title: 4. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at our contact page.
